effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. Power is increased by 100% its original value for every stage any of the user’s stats have been raised. Accuracy, evasion, and lowered stats do not affect this move’s power. For a Pokémon with all five stats modified to +6, this move’s power is 31×.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Power is increased by 100% its original value for every stage any of the user’s stats have been raised. Accuracy, evasion, and lowered stats do not affect this move’s power. For a Pokémon with all five stats modified to +6, this move’s power is 31×.

short_effect.x_y: Power is higher the more the user’s stats have been raised, to a maximum of 31×.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Power is higher the more the user’s stats have been raised, to a maximum of 31×.

flavor_text.x_y: The user attacks the target with stored power. The more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the move’s power.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user attacks the target with stored power. The more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the move’s power.
